scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r CNAME *.css img/ *.html *.js dist/ || true && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:deps
scripts.build:deps: mv frontend/dist/sample/browser dist/sample && cp node_modules/chess.js/dist/esm/chess.js node_modules/@chrisoakman/chessboardjs/dist/chessboard-1.0.0.min.css node_modules/@chrisoakman/chessboardjs/dist/chessboard-1.0.0.min.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/
